metadata.title: CVE-2017-14737 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A cryptographic cache-based side channel in the RSA implementation in Botanbefore 1.10.17, and 1.11.x and 2.x before 2.3.0, allows a local attacker torecover information about RSA secret keys, as demonstrated by CacheD. Thisoccurs because an array is indexed with bits derived from a secret key.

criterions.comment: botan1.10: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
